children.docstring: * Do not use implicitly nullable parameters
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * [#118](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/diff/pull/118): Improve performance of `MemoryEfficientLongestCommonSubsequenceCalculator` * [#119](http
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * `SebastianBergmann\Diff\Exception` now correctly extends `\Throwable`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Changed PHP version constraint in `composer.json` from `^7.3 || ^8.0` to `>=7.3`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * This component is now supported on PHP 8
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * [#99](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/diff/pull/99): Regression in unified diff output of identical strings
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * Removed support for PHP 7.1 and PHP 7.2
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: * `Chunk::setLines()` now ensures that the `$lines` array only contains `Line` objects
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * Removed `"minimum-stability": "dev",` from `composer.json`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * The default `DiffOutputBuilderInterface` implementation now generates context lines (unchanged lines)
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: * Removed support for PHP 7.0
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: * [#70](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/diff/issues/70): Diffing of arrays no longer works
children.name: Fixed

symbols.docstring: * The `StrictUnifiedDiffOutputBuilder` implementation of the `DiffOutputBuilderInterface` was added

children.docstring: * [#66](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/diff/pull/66): Restored backwards compatibility for PHPUnit 6.1.4, 6.2.0, 6.2.1, 6.2.2, and 6.2.3
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: * [#64](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/diff/pull/64): Show line numbers for chunks of a diff
children.name: Added

children.docstring: * This component is no longer supported on PHP 5.6
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: The `Differ` class can be used to generate a textual representation of the difference between two strings:
children.name: Generating diff

children.docstring: This is default builder, which generates the output close to udiff and is used by PHPUnit.
children.name: UnifiedDiffOutputBuilder

children.docstring: Generates (strict) Unified diff's (unidiffs) with hunks, similar to `diff -u` and compatible with `patch` and `git apply`.
children.name: StrictUnifiedDiffOutputBuilder

children.docstring: Output only the lines that differ.
children.name: DiffOnlyOutputBuilder

children.docstring: You can pass any output builder to the `Differ` class as longs as it implements the `DiffOutputBuilderInterface`.
children.name: DiffOutputBuilderInterface

children.docstring: The `Parser` class can be used to parse a unified diff into an object graph:
children.name: Parsing diff

symbols.docstring: You can add this library as a local, per-project dependency to your project using [Composer](https://getcomposer.org/):
symbols.name: Installation
